name: Happy Stable
description: Cosmic scientis Lance transform a horse be a COSMIC Kaiju. You need contorl this Kaiju to destroy Stable. But the COSMIC Kaiju is hard to contorl you need use different Key position to contorl it!Here is the 11 way to contorl the COSMIC Kaiju. But there also have some Key position we did not know. You need try by your self.
